alert.note: Alert for Divide; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:39PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN WILLIAMS AND DIVIDE COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM CDT... At 638 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Alkabo to 7 miles southwest of Writing Rock State Historical Site to 11 miles northeast of Medicine Lake. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Alkabo around 645 PM CDT. Fortuna and Writing Rock State Historical Site around 650 PM CDT. Grenora around 700 PM CDT. Crosby around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Zahl, Hanks, Ambrose, Corinth and Appam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
